trans-unit.source: Creates a change notification handle and sets up initial change notification filter conditions

seg-source.mrk: Creates a change notification handle and sets up initial change notification filter conditions

target.mrk: Creates a change notification handle and sets up initial change notification filter conditions

trans-unit.source: The full path of the directory to be watched.

seg-source.mrk: The full path of the directory to be watched.

target.mrk: The full path of the directory to be watched.

trans-unit.source: The filter conditions that satisfy a change notification wait. This parameter can be one or more of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: The filter conditions that satisfy a change notification wait.
This parameter can be one or more of the following values:

target.mrk: The filter conditions that satisfy a change notification wait.
This parameter can be one or more of the following values:

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether to monitor the subdirectories of the specified directory, valid values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies whether to monitor the subdirectories of the specified directory, valid values:

target.mrk: Specifies whether to monitor the subdirectories of the specified directory, valid values:

trans-unit.source: True - Monitor the directory tree rooted at the specified directory.

seg-source.mrk: True - Monitor the directory tree rooted at the specified directory.

target.mrk: True - Monitor the directory tree rooted at the specified directory.

trans-unit.source: False - Monitor only the specified directory (Default).

seg-source.mrk: False - Monitor only the specified directory (Default).

target.mrk: False - Monitor only the specified directory (Default).

trans-unit.source: A handle to a find change notification object.

seg-source.mrk: A handle to a find change notification object.

target.mrk: A handle to a find change notification object.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_Wait... functions can monitor the specified directory or subtree by using the handle returned by this function.

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_Wait... functions can monitor the specified directory or subtree by using the handle returned by this function.

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_Wait... functions can monitor the specified directory or subtree by using the handle returned by this function.

trans-unit.source: A wait is satisfied when one of the filter conditions occurs in the monitored directory or subtree.

seg-source.mrk: A wait is satisfied when one of the filter conditions occurs in the monitored directory or subtree.

target.mrk: A wait is satisfied when one of the filter conditions occurs in the monitored directory or subtree.

trans-unit.source: After the wait has been satisfied, the application can respond to this condition and continue monitoring the directory by calling the _WinAPI_FindNextChangeNotification() function and the appropriate wait function.

seg-source.mrk: After the wait has been satisfied, the application can respond to this condition and continue monitoring the directory by calling the _WinAPI_FindNextChangeNotification() function and the appropriate wait function.

target.mrk: After the wait has been satisfied, the application can respond to this condition and continue monitoring the directory by calling the _WinAPI_FindNextChangeNotification() function and the appropriate wait function.

trans-unit.source: When the handle is no longer needed, it can be closed by using the _WinAPI_FindCloseChangeNotification() function.

seg-source.mrk: When the handle is no longer needed, it can be closed by using the _WinAPI_FindCloseChangeNotification() function.

target.mrk: When the handle is no longer needed, it can be closed by using the _WinAPI_FindCloseChangeNotification() function.

trans-unit.source: Notifications may not be returned when calling _WinAPI_FindFirstChangeNotification() for a remote file system.

seg-source.mrk: Notifications may not be returned when calling _WinAPI_FindFirstChangeNotification() for a remote file system.

target.mrk: Notifications may not be returned when calling _WinAPI_FindFirstChangeNotification() for a remote file system.

trans-unit.source: to ease a file creation in this folder
